discussion.content: QUALITY: defines standards delivered scope must meet to be fit for purpose.

questions.question_text: Which aspect of project performance must be managed to ensure the project's products are fit for purpose?

discussion.content: From the Glossary "A temporary organization that is created for the purpose of delivering one or more business products according to an agreed business case."

questions.question_text: Identify the missing words in the following sentence. A project is [ ? ] organization that is created for the purpose of delivering business products.

choices.A: Tailoring PRINCE2 to the project environment

questions.question_text: Which is NOT one of the PRINCE2 integrated elements?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
DELETE - its 5 integrated elements since Prince 2 v7 - Themes and Tailoring no longer there.

Project Context, People, Principles, Practices, Processes

Selected Answer: B
One of PRINCE2â€™s key principles is managing by stages and tolerances, which helps optimize management time and decision-making.
I havent seen B as definition.

choices.B: Provides for the efficient and economic use of management time
choices.A: Is a method specifically designed for technical projects
choices.C: Includes many of the proven planning techniques, such as critical path analysis
choices.D: Can be used to manage both projects and programmes

questions.question_text: Which is a benefit of using PRINCE2?
Which is assumed to be a supplier's responsibility in the PRINCE2 customer/supplier environment?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Agreed with tosanca
it is not the same as 65. 65 asks for the customers. 68 for the suppliers
This is the same question as #65 and the answer is A

choices.B: Provide the resources and skills to deliver the desired result
choices.D: Specify the benefits of the project
